Frequently Asked Questions

There are no expenses, hidden fees, or closing costs when your property is sold to us. We will not ask for any money up front or at closing.

Filling out the required fields in the Sell Now form is all that is required to get started. The more fields you can answer will help us with the process to make you an offer, but we really don't need all that much information.

Not a problem! We will prepare a new deed for the purchase of your property and won’t need you to provide a copy of your deed. We can acquire most, if not all, of the documents we need from the county offices to complete the purchase, so it won’t require much effort on your end at all.
